Firstly setup up WSL2

Then install visual studio code (https://code.visualstudio.com/)

install WSL VS code extension (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode-remote.remote-wsl)

install VS code R extensions (https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/r)
